title: Sagar Rattana - Citin Cafe - maybe closed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Thai, Western, Beer/Wine
description: Vegetarian restaurant situated within Citin Pratunam Hotel in Pratunam, previously operated as Citin Cafe. Serves buffet breakfast, lunch, dinner. Nice atmosphere with free Wi-Fi access. Directions: enter Petchburi soi 17, turn right, look for Citin Pratunam sign (approx 50m), turn left, go to the end of the soi. FEB 2014 REPORTED SHUT DOWN SINCE JAN 2014 - please let happycow know!
